brand.description: The brand the user orginally signed up with. NOTE - for Surfline, Buoyweather, and Fishtrack - users get a single account for all 3 brands. This field cpatures the brand they originally signed up with.

createdAt.description: The date the user's account was created (in seconds since the epoch).

crossDomainId.description: The user's Cross Domain ID (if they had one).

cwUserId.description: The user's CoastalWatch user ID (if they had one).

distance.description: The distance typically travelled to go surfing by the user.

experiments.description: An array of experiments and variants a user was assigned to.

favoritesCount.description: The number of favorites the user has.

isEmailVerified.description: True if the user has verified their email.

location.countryIso.description: The ISO code for the user's country.

location.subdivisionOne.description: The first subdivision of the user's location.

location.subdivisionTwo.description: The second subdivision of the user's location.

location.subdivisionTwoIso.description: The ISO code for the second subdivision of the user's location.

migrated_brand.description: Name of the previous brand the user migrated from. Used to flag users who migrated from surf2surf.

receivePromotions.description: True if the user wants to receive promotions.

subscription.active.description: True if the user's subscription is active (including free-trial).

subscription.availablediscount.10off.description: The 10% discount available to the user (if any).

subscription.availablediscount.20off.description: The 20% discount available to the user (if any).

subscription.availablediscount.50off.description: The 50% discount available to the user (if any).

subscription.discount.description: The discount the user has applied to their subscription (if any).

subscription.expiration.description: The date the user's subscription will expire.

subscription.in_grace_period.description: True if the user is in a grace period.

subscription.in_trial.description: True if the user is in a free trial.

subscription.interval.description: The interval of the user's subscription.

subscription.interval_count.description: The number of intervals the user's subscription has.

subscription.plan_id.description: the ID of the plan the user is subscribed to.

subscription.promotionId.description: the ID of the promotion connected to the user's subscription.

subscription.renewalCount.description: The number of times the user has renewed their subscription.

subscription.trial_eligible.description: True if the user is eligible for a free trial.

subscription_currency.description: The currency of the user's subscription.

zeroChecksLeft.description: Server-side trait fired when a user a user has zero surf checks left from rate limiting.
